title: Jayce Accelerated Shock Blast Bug
body: If Jayce places Acceleration Gate fast enough after using Shock Blast, Shock Blast will not go through the gate and neither accelerates the Shock Blast nor increases the damage done. Placing the gate at max range on top of Shock Blast seems to trigger this. Not too certain if other players have had this before, but I've experienced it several times now.

replies.body:
It's better to use Shock Blast before using Acceleration Gate on most occasions and I've seen a lot of Jayce players do this. It's still a little disappointing to see the trick fail, but like you said, it may just be the way it's made.

Thanks, I'll keep that in mind next time. :)
For the future, use the "Reply" button to reply to someone. Keeps things organised and gives that person notification of the message. ;)

Maybe with the way it's coded, it always expects you to use Acceleration Gate before casting Shock Blast. May be intentional, to allow enemies to anticipate shots.

Bug reports usually go [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
